attributes.action: Scrap the '16 hour rule' that prevents people on benefit from accessing full time learning in our FE Colleges.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This rule highlights the clash of cultures between the DWP and the DFES. One wants jobs the other qualifications. The UK needs people to learn, raise their skills then get good jobs. If they try and educate themselves - their benefit stops. Scrap the rule and provide a route out of the benefit trap that avoids the minimum wage!
